title: Multifunctioning graphene oxide capping layer for highly efficient and stable PEDOT:PSS–silicon hybrid solar cells
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,4799-4812
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00889H, Paper
Ruchi K. Sharma, Avritti Srivastava, Urvashi Punia, Riya Bansal, Pukhraj Prajapat, Govind Gupta, Sanjay K. Srivastava
The application of graphene oxide (GO) capping layer over polymer is demonstrated for high-efficiency and stable PEDOT:PSS–Si hybrid solar cells in a simple device design, which may lead to the realization of cost-effective solar cell technology.
